page.title: 04CUSTOMS
page.content: { {MAYOR CHOOSING.}Usually takes place in May. {GALA WEEK.}This is held in aid of The Lostwithiel Silver Band and takes place at the end of July. {BEATING THE BOUNDS.}A thirteen mile hike around the boundary stones of the Borough boundary to ascertain they have not been moved. Every person may bend over the stone and receive a blow from a stick and a small coin. This event usually takes place in May or on such other occasion as deemed appropriate such as a Coronation or other national celebration. {FESTIVAL WEEK.}Held around the 24th. August to commemorate the three day feast of{St. Bartholomew}granted by {Richard, King of the Romans, Earl of {Cornwall, in 1269 A.D.
